title: When the coffer dam is constructed around the Battleship is it going to be dredged out so the ship floats inside the enclosure? If so will divers be sent to inspect the underside of the hull for damage?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/08/when-the-cofferdam-is-constructed-around-the-battleship-north-carolina-is-it-going-to-be-dredged-out-so-the-ship-floats-inside-the-enclosure/
